backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s data models for residents, medications, vitals, MAR, ADL records, and related entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries for numerous frontend source files and components.
frontend/docs/deploy-v57.md: Historical deployment guide for Version 57 with verification steps, deployment commands, and smoke‑test checklist.
frontend/docs/deploy-v58.md: Historical deployment guide for Version 58 including version checks, deployment steps, and full post-deploy tests.
frontend/docs/deploy-v59.md: Primary deployment guide for Version 59 covering version markers, build/deploy steps, smoke tests, and troubleshooting.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Checklist for deploying and validating the rollback build to version 57, including pre‑deployment checks, deployment commands, smoke tests, and troubleshooting.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, along with global border and background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting app version 59 and loading the main React bundle and icons.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icon, colors, and standalone display mode.
frontend/public/version.txt: Contains the current frontend version marker, set to 59.
frontend/scripts/deploy-ic-v59.sh: Shell script automating version 59 deployment with version checks, dfx validation, and post‑deploy verification reminders.
frontend/scripts/README.md: Overview of deployment scripts and prerequisites for deploying version 59.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router and query client, wrapping routes with authentication and global UI providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication gate that shows loading, login UI, or protected content based on Internet Identity state.
Logo component that tries multiple URL variants and falls back to initials if image loading fails.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: App shell providing header, navigation, main content outlet, footer, and sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Navigation bar rendering the dashboard link with active‑state styling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: A dialog component for creating a new resident with extensive form state, validation, and nested data handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: A dialog for adding a new ADL record with validation, identity checks, and API submission.
Displays a resident's ADL history with loading, empty state, sorting, and delete functionality.
Re-exports ADL-related components for easier imports.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: A dialog for editing an existing resident’s information with form state resets, field handlers, and add/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Dialog for creating a new MAR record, handling medication selection, validation, and submission.
Re-exports MAR-related components for easier imports.
Displays a resident's MAR history with sorting, empty/loading states, and delete actions.
Dialog for adding a new medication, including route selection, times, physician, and notes.
Dialog for editing an existing medication, preloading fields and saving updates.
Re-exports medication-related components and selectors for easier imports.
Select component for choosing a prescribing physician with fallback text input when none exist.
Component for selecting a medication administration route, including an 'other' option with a text input.
Renders edit, discontinue/resume, and delete action buttons for a medication with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident summary card with status, actions, and delete confirmation dialog.
Header section for the resident dashboard with a title and button to add new residents.
UI bar for filtering residents by room and sorting by different fields.
Renders a grid of resident cards or a placeholder when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI counts for total, active, and discharged residents in three cards.
Tab selector for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for entering daily vitals, validating inputs, and submitting a new vitals record.
Displays a resident's vitals history with sorting, status badges, and delete support.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card listing missing reference materials with a link to the full checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides centralized factory functions for resident-related React Query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor while invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Runs a timeout‑protected anonymous health check and reports reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and resident directory data, with fallbacks and identity-aware caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup including light/dark theme variables and custom print styles for reports.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports application branding constants such as name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/medicationRoutes.ts: Defines medication administration routes and utilities for converting, formatting, and mapping route values between UI and backend.
frontend/src/lib/medications.ts: Provides helper functions for updating, deleting, toggling, filtering, and generating IDs for medication records.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query's QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main residents dashboard with filtering, sorting, KPIs, and actions using data from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data for residents, including a special case for resident ID 3.
Defines resident profile data types and returns fallback mock profile data when backend data is unavailable.
Contains a mock list of residents with basic demographic and status information.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions to calculate and format a resident's age from a birthdate string.
Transforms backend resident data into UI-friendly view models including age and room formatting.
Utility functions for filtering, sorting, and computing KPIs for resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Main resident profile page that loads backend or mock data and manages dialogs for vitals, MAR, ADL, medications, editing, and printing.
Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, insurance, and medication details.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: Displays a checklist-style reference capture guide outlining required screenshots and design details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist or clear parameters across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, Maui Lane app build notes, existing features, known issues, and generated assets for the ICP Motoko + React project.
